mapper.select: WITH hours AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{search_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) + (LEVEL - 1) / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS acq_date, LPAD((LEVEL - 1), 2, '0') AS acq_hour FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 24 ) SELECT h.acq_date, h.acq_hour, NVL(t.total_cnt, 0) AS total_cnt, NVL(t.interest_total_cnt, 0) AS interest_total_cnt FROM hours h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(a.acq_start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS acq_date, TO_CHAR(a.acq_start_dt, 'HH24') AS acq_hour, COUNT(*) AS total_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.acq_interest > 0 THEN 1 END) AS interest_total_cnt FROM tb_acquisition a WHERE TRUNC(a.acq_start_dt) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{search_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND TRUNC(a.acq_start_dt) < TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{search_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) + INTERVAL '1' DAY AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_subscription s WHERE s.sbs_seq = a.sbs_seq AND s.sbs_seq = #{sbs_seq} ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(a.acq_start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(a.acq_start_dt, 'HH24') ) t ON h.acq_date = t.acq_date AND h.acq_hour = t.acq_hour ORDER BY h.acq_date, h.acq_hour

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN acq_gender = 'M' AND a.sbs_seq = #{sbs_seq} THEN 1 END) AS male_total_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.acq_interest > 0 AND acq_gender = 'M' AND a.sbs_seq = #{sbs_seq} THEN 1 END) AS male_interest_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN acq_gender = 'W' AND a.sbs_seq = #{sbs_seq} THEN 1 END) AS female_total_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.acq_interest > 0 AND acq_gender = 'W' AND a.sbs_seq = #{sbs_seq} THEN 1 END) AS female_interest_cnt, TO_CHAR(MAX(a.acq_end_dt), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS update_time
FROM tb_acquisition a WHERE TRUNC(a.acq_start_dt) = TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{search_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.insert: insert into tb_acquisition (acq_gender, acq_interest, acq_start_dt, acq_end_dt, acq_tid, sbs_seq) values(#{acq_gender}, #{acq_interest}, TO_DATE(#{acq_start_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{acq_end_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{acq_tid}, (select s.sbs_seq from tb_subscription s, tb_device d where s.device_seq = d.device_seq and d.device_uid = #{device_uid} and s.sbs_status = 'Y'))
mapper.select: select nvl(max(acq_tid),0) as max_tid from tb_acquisition where sbs_seq = (select sbs.sbs_seq from tb_subscription sbs inner join tb_device dev on sbs.device_seq = dev.device_seq and sbs.sbs_status = 'Y' and dev.device_uid = #{device_uid})
mapper.update: update tb_acquisition a set a.acq_gender = #{acq_gender}, a.acq_interest = #{acq_interest}, a.acq_start_dt = TO_DATE(#{acq_start_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), a.acq_end_dt = TO_DATE(#{acq_end_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) where a.acq_tid = #{acq_tid} and a.sbs_seq = (select s.sbs_seq from tb_subscription s, tb_device d where s.device_seq = d.device_seq and d.device_uid = #{device_uid} and s.sbs_status = 'Y')
